poster: p a t r i o t
title: Will we ever find out what this is?
body:
Or does anyone have theories?
http://imgur.com/1HfmNJE

replies.body: It's a flying manta ray
http://cdn.bulbagarden.net/upload/thumb/c/c5/226Mantine.png/250px-226Mantine.png
BAP BAP BAP

"Don't use Thunder, use Stomp instead!"

A cookie to anyone who gets this reference.
It's actually Anivia, in one of the battle cast teasers Anivia's name came up among the other battle cast robots. Guess that skin was scrapped tho.

I doubt its Anivia.

The blueprints had ANV among them,but it was never hinted that battlecast anivia ever made it into production(the other bc skins came much later,so they were definetly not in production back when the blueprints were released)

And the shape of this thing looks rather off(it seems to look at us,but the wings bend into a different direction than anivias) and one of the important things about skins is to preserve the shape of the champ.
It's a lost kite.

It's in Creator Viktor's Recall-Animation aswell:
http://img3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130906013237/leagueoflegends/images/b/b1/Viktor_Recall.png

http://static2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120802032044/leagueoflegends/images/8/8a/Battlecast_Cho'Gath_Specs.jpg
The mentioning of "ANV" at the top right corner of Battlecast Cho'gath Primes Blueprints. It's probably scrapped tho and at this time Vel'Koz wasn't a thing.
Yet Vel'Koz is shown in Creator Viktor's Splashart (Vel'Koz wasn't released at this time) and Battlecast Skarner Alpha is seen in Battlecast Cho'Gath's Splash (The last battlecast skin is shown in the first one's splash...).

Tl;dr:
Could be Anivia with a chance of 5%, otherwise it's either a new champion or someone who can thematically fly.
Let's not forget tho that Battlecasts are mostly creatures from the void - And ironically most of them are lategame monsters.
Hoping its a new champion, pref Kog's Dad, Kass's daughter, or a new Void champ in general.

> Let's not forget tho that Battlecasts are mostly creatures from the void - And ironically most of them are lategame monsters.

I also like to think the most forward set of exhaust pipes belong to this skin.

http://i.imgur.com/rywFXqL.jpg
It's obviously a Jigglypuff as seen from above.
My guess is that it was a teased champion that hit some kind of bump in the road, and was then iceboxed to either be dropped or picked up at a later date.
ITS JOHN CENA

I know what it is >:3

https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/79/Mobula_mobular.jpg/220px-Mobula_mobular.jpg

It's a flying devil fish.... now i want some seafood...
It's a flipped Sharpedo
While I can't say for certain, as I'm not 100% sure myself, I am a fan of the manta ray theory. :3
nah, it's battlecast corki, obviously :p
It's Mothra Vel Koz.
_"WHO'S THAT POKEMON?!"_
"IT'S PICKACHU!"
and his name is....

It's Batman!

(Aatrox?)
Aatrox has a mecha skin, so probably not.

Sorry, but it's just the peak of a rock poking though the smoke.

Although a flying manta ray would be cool...

It's not a rock, as it shows up in Creator Viktor's recall as well.

http://static3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130906013239/leagueoflegends/images/b/b1/Viktor_Recall.png

I can see why people would make that correlation. 
Unfortunately though, that's the canceled Battlecast Anivia skin and perhaps you may be looking at it the wrong way. 
The bottom of that image is her head and the top "horns" are her exhaust pipes.

I'm sorry to burst bubbles, but it is indeed just a rock.
It was a skin - Battlecast Anivia which was canceled later because they said it would not fit for her, his recall animation has it aswell and on the Wiki of unreleased content it mentions this skin
